{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.05032v1", "title": "Contact surgery numbers of projective spaces", "summary": "We classify all contact projective spaces with contact surgery number one. In
particular, this implies that there exist infinitely many non-isotopic contact
structures on the real projective 3-space which cannot be obtained by a single
rational contact surgery from the standard tight contact 3-sphere.
  Large parts of our proofs deal with a detailed analysis of Gompf's
$\Gamma$-invariant of tangential 2-plane fields on 3-manifolds. From our main
result we also deduce that the $\Gamma$-invariant of a tangential 2-plane field
on the real projective 3-space only depends on its $d_3$-invariant.", "main_category": "math.GT", "categories": "math.GT,math.SG", "published": "2025-04-07T12:54:55Z"}
